EmailTemplate.name: 19-Public Safety-Mobile BB for LTE-Email-Nurture MBB LTE-T003MI.Email 1 Drones V
EmailTemplate.subject: Use drones to speed up search and rescue operations
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Video Accelerate search and rescue operations with drones Drone-mounted cameras and sensors can put eyes in the sky to help first responders search remote areas and gain situational awareness that is impossible from the ground.
See how our aerial insights solution <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jkfIfw42Mrs&index=9&list=PLgKNvl454BxfZIStSv_ZfihHzByQ351Nx]]> combines drones with 4G LTE networks to help first responders conduct fast, safe and successful search and rescue missions over any terrain. Learn more about our solutions for public safety https://networks.nokia.com/industries/public-sector/public-safety/4g-lte <[[https://networks.nokia.com/industries/public-sector/public-safety/4g-lte?did=d000000001cg&utm_campaign=mobile_bb_for_lte&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email1-drones&utm_term=mbb_for_ps]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
